name: The doubled edged sword
description:
The game follows the theme "are we the bad guys", have a plot of human abandoned Tars came from Mars, and they got mad so they are here for the suicide revenge. and humans don't fight them themselves but calls out the man-like robot blade runner to finish the business. In the game, the player plays as the blade runner and fights the Tars herd.
